metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: POs created after Invoice Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a PO Item has been created after the Invoice Receipt event

metrics.name: Overdue payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue payments. Only cases that have not been paid yet are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${overdue_payment_condition_ariba})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${invoice_clearing_date_ariba} IS NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Late payments cycle time
metrics.description: Average payment cycle time of cases with late payments
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events_ariba})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER 
    	(WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events_ariba})))
	) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition_ariba})
	AND ${invoice_clearing_date_ariba} IS NOT NULL
	)

metrics.name: Invoices waiting for Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with Invoices waiting for the Goods Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${goods_receipt_events_ariba}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES(${invoice_receipt_event_flow_ariba}))
	)

metrics.name: On-Time Delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with on-time deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average time from purchase order to delivery
metrics.description: Average time from purchase order to goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${goods_receipt_events_ariba}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events_ariba}))
   )

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events_ariba}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events_ariba}))
   )

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${po_creation_events_ariba}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${pr_creation_events_ariba}))
   )

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late payments. Only cases that are paid are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${late_payment_condition_ariba})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${invoice_clearing_date_ariba} IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricVariables.name: ptp_compliant_event_sequence_ariba
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PR Item' ~> 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Receive PO Item' ~> 'Receive Invoice' ~> 'Reconcile Invoice' ~> 'Pay Invoice' $
metricVariables.value: ^ 'Create PR Item' ~> 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Receive PO Item' ~> 'Receive Invoice' ~> 'Reconcile Invoice' ~> 'Pay Invoice' $

metricVariables.name: delivery_due_date_ariba
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the delivery is due, for example "PO Requested Delivery Date"

metricVariables.name: overdue_delivery_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition identifying cases with an overdue delivery, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Requested Delivery Date"  AND "PO Requested Delivery Date" IS NULL
metricVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Requested Delivery Date" AND "PO Delivery Status" IS NULL

metricVariables.name: po_created_after_invoice_receipt_ariba
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating the creation of a PO Item after the Invoice has been received, for example ('Receive Invoice'|'Reconcile Invoice') ~> 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events_ariba
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Pay Invoice'

metricVariables.name: po_creation_events_ariba
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

metricVariables.name: two_way_match_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition identifying cases with a two-way attribute match, for example "PO Item Total Amount" = "Last Invoice Item Amount"
metricVariables.value: "PO Item Total Amount" = "Last Invoice Item Amount"

metricVariables.name: pr_creation_events_ariba
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events_ariba
metricVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Receive Invoice', 'Reconcile Invoice'

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_date_ariba
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Invoice Payment Date"

metricVariables.name: goods_receipt_date_ariba
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the goods have been received, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Item Delivery Date")

metricVariables.name: overdue_payment_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition that identifies cases with overdue invoices, for example "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
metricVariables.value: "Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

metricVariables.name: late_payment_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition that identifies cases with invoices paid late, for example "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"
metricVariables.value: "Last Invoice Due Date" < "Last Invoice Payment Date"

metricVariables.name: late_delivery_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition identifying cases that are delivered too late, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Requested Delivery Date"
metricVariables.value: DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Requested Delivery Date"

metricVariables.name: goods_receipt_events_ariba
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the receipt of goods, for example 'Receive PO item'

metricVariables.name: delivery_completed_condition_ariba
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that the delivery for a PO Item is completed, for example "PO Delivery Status" = 'Received'

metricVariables.name: invoice_receipt_event_flow_ariba
metricVariables.description: Event flow indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example ('Receive Invoice'|'Reconcile Invoice')
